message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob! What do you say?
I'll give you 400,000, but I think I deserve more for my part in this negotiation!
That's a bit too lopsided, Bob! I'm thinking more like 55/45 in my favor.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, Bob. What do you think?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. I'll give you 350,000, but I'm not budging further.
That's still not good enough, Bob. I'll need a better deal than that. I'm thinking 60/40 in my favor this time.
I'll give you a bit more, Bob. Let's see if we can make a deal this time.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'm willing to give you 300,000, but I think I deserve more. This is my final offer.
I'm not convinced, Bob. I think I can do better than that. I'll make one more offer, and then I'm walking away.
This is my final offer, Bob. I think it's a fair split, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept it.
